<< close Graphics functions colormap >>

colorbar

Colorbar showing color scale.

Syntax

colorbar()
colorbar(..., propertyName, propertyValue)
colorbar(target, ...)
c = colorbar(...)

Input argument

propertyName

a scalar string or row vector character.

propertyValue

a value.

target

Target: axes.

Output argument

c

graphics object: axes on color bar.

Description

colorbaradds a color bar into a plot.

Examples

f = figure();
surf(peaks);
colormap('summer');
colorbar()


f = figure();
surf(peaks);
colormap('gray');
cb = colorbar(gca);

See also

colormap.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
